subject: Use builds config to bypass static-site pipeline entirely
body:
The zero-config pipeline assumes a static site and demands an output
directory. Previous attempts to satisfy it (buildCommand: "", mkdir,
placeholder files) kept hitting the next check. Switch to the builds
allowlist model: only api/*.ts files are built via @vercel/node, no
output directory needed. Root npm install still runs for dependencies.
